CustomField.description: The contact linked to this proposal's account who is the second designated contract signer (usually blank as most contracts have only one signer)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The contact linked to this proposal's account who is the second designated contract signer (usually blank as most contracts have only one signer)
CustomField.label: Contract signer 2

lookupFilter.errorMessage: The contract signer's account must be the same as this proposal's account
lookupFilter.infoMessage: The contract signer's account must be the same as this proposal's account
